page.title: 09C.J. Hammond & Co. Ltd.
page.content: {C. J. Hammond & Co.}have operated in Horley & Reigate for{25 yrs.and}are now based in 33,000 square foot premises at{Salbrook Road, Salfords. Employ{70}people ,half being drivers of{Heavy Goods Vehicles,}6 experienced maintenance engineers.The company provides{warehousing}facilities for customers products e.g. heavy machinery,building materials, sugar,paper,beer.Export Casemaking & Packing Department.Goods ranging from lamp posts to computers 6 washbasins crated, then placed into special containers for{shipping to Africa, {Middle and Far East. {Drivers}in U.K. spend several nights away from home each week. Vehicles have specially equipped 'sleeper cabs',in winter kept warm by specially fitted cab heaters.
